data.text: @MRG_DJ WTH? @AWFJ What was your motivation to create the "Special Mentions" category? It's actions like this that perpetuate the stereotype that women journalists aren't to be taken seriously. I'd rethink this category in the future.

@MRG_DJ Both JLaw and KWinslet won the Oscars and GG and even bafta already, I think this is just saying that they need a better agent for they are good actresses to begin with for a better role/better script /movies. Just sayin ✌️
@mayisdornan @MRG_DJ They bashed her and still they get a premier 🙄🙄
